title: Silk
info: Silk is an item used to craft the Bed, as well as several placeable decorative items and vanity clothing items. One unit of Silk can be crafted out of seven Cobwebs at a Loom. While raw Cobwebs have no value, Silk sells for 2 each.

Rarity00*

Research25 required
